Articles.Content:
Since I've started uploading stuff to KerbalX, I've been trying out a lot of other folks' work.  Much of it is really impressive, and I am learning a lot about how to build better myself by doing so.

So, I'm curious to hear about favorites--or if it is too hard to choose just one--aircraft other people have built that you downloaded and thought, "That is just fantastic". 

The reasoning can be: fly-ability, artistic creativity, weirdness, best replica of a real life airplane or spacecraft (or boat or sub)...whatever.

Please post a screenshot and if possible, a link if you can, and tell us why you like it.   I'm always keen to try out other people's creations.

 

 

Edited June 4, 2018 by Klapaucius
